name: nativescript-shimmer-enduco
description: Facebook shimmer effect for your NativeScript app - iOS and Android.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run demo.build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo-ng.ios: npm run demo.build && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --emulator --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm run demo.build && cd ../demo && tns run android --emulator  --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo-ng.android: npm run demo.build && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --emulator  --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.reset: rimraf demo/hooks demo/node_modules demo/platforms demo-ng/hooks demo-ng/node_modules demo-ng/platforms
